knimeNode.name: Phylogeny Processor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Using the PAL library, as exported from MUSCLE node, this tree takes input data and performs tree construction, bootstrapping and other phylogenetic analyses as configured by the user.

fullDescription.intro: This node provides various methods to work with Phylogenetic data: trees, distance matrices etc. This node uses the java Phylogenetic Analysis Library (PAL) to do much of the work.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)
